v2: Income: Atkinson, Anthony B. (2015). The distribution of top incomes in former British West Africa. The World Wealth and Income Database WP 3/2015.

v11: Estimate of the population of adults aged 15+
v12: Estimate of the population of single adults aged 15+ and married couples
v31: The Pareto-Lorenz a coefficients were computed using the top shares estimates (from the top 0.01% share within the top 0.1% share): a=1/[1-log(S0.1%/S0.01%)/log(10)].
v32: The inverted Pareto-Lorenz b coefficients were computed from the Pareto-Lorenz a coefficients using the formula b=a/(a-1). Alternatively they can be computed by using directly the top income shares estimates and the formula: b=1/[log(Skx%/Sx%)/log(k)].
